typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> taxiSource
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> movieSource
taxiSource derive(month = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[2],
		year = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[1],
		day = split(split(pickup_datetime,' ')[1],'-')[3]) ~> decompdatetime
decompdatetime sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> taxiSink
movieSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating
	),
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		movie
	)) ~> sink1
